text:
A team of the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation conducted surprise checks on 977 power connections in different parts of Woraiyur section on Thursday and detected violations and meter faults in some of them. A 14-member team of engineers and field staff led by Rajendra Vijay, Executive Engineer (operations and maintenance), Tiruchi Metro Circle, carried out the surprise checks and detected meter faults in some connections. Surprise checks would continue, a press release said.

Recruitment rally

The 117 Infantry Battalion (Territorial Army), The Guards, Tiruchi, will conduct a recruitment rally for the posts of Soldier (general duty, tailor and hair dresser) from February 23 to 27 at the Army Training area at Khajamalai near Mannarpuram in the city. Applicants should be in the age group 18 to 42 years. They would have to undergo a physical fitness test and medical checks. Residents of Tamil Nadu, Kerala, Karnataka, Andhra Pradesh, Gujarat, Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Goa and the Union Territories of Puducherry, Dadra and Nagar Haveli, Daman and Diu and Lakshadweep can participate in the recruitment.
title: Surprise check
